results.noResultsHint: Try different keywords or adjust filters
results.emptyIndexResult: No index results found. Try using API mode search.

index.disabled: Index mode is disabled. API mode search will be used. Configure ENABLED_SEARCH_INDEX to enable index mode.

notReady.title: No available index detected
notReady.description1: Configure Repo-Viewer-Search Actions in the target repository
notReady.description2: Generate index files under the @@branch@@ branch

branchMissing.title: Index branch does not exist. API mode search will be used
branchMissing.description2: Configure Actions in the target repository to generate index branch

manifestNotFound.title: Index file missing. API mode search will be used
manifestNotFound.description2: Check if Actions correctly generated index files

manifestInvalid.title: Index format error. API mode search will be used
manifestInvalid.description1: Try running Actions again to generate index files

fileNotFound.title: Index content missing. API mode search will be used
fileNotFound.description2: Try running Actions again to generate index files

documentInvalid.title: Index file format error. API mode search will be used
documentInvalid.description1: Index content is corrupted or incorrectly formatted
documentInvalid.description2: Try running Actions again to generate index files

unsupportedCompression.title: Unsupported compression format. API mode search will be used
unsupportedCompression.description1: Index file uses unsupported compression format
unsupportedCompression.description2: Regenerate index file using standard gzip compression format

default.title: Failed to load index. API mode search will be used
default.description2: Check if index file exists and is correctly formatted

network.timeout: Request timeout, please check your network connection
network.connection: Network connection failed, please try again later

api.forbidden: API access restricted, please check access permissions
api.serverError: Server error, please try again later

file.download: File download failed, please try again
file.downloadInProgress: A download task is already in progress, please wait for it to complete
file.downloadLinkUnavailable: Unable to get file download link
file.compress: File compression failed, file may be too large
file.parse: File parsing failed, format may not be supported

error.component: Page component error, please refresh the page
error.validation: Input data is invalid, please check and try again
error.default: Operation failed, please try again later

preview.unsupportedFileType: This file type is not supported for preview
preview.downloadLinkUnavailable: Unable to get file download link

boundary.retryExceeded: Error persists after multiple retries, please refresh the page or contact support
boundary.unknownError: An unknown error occurred, please try again later

readme.empty: README content is empty or failed to load.
